org.drools.planner.examples.ras2012

Class CLI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drools.planner.examples.ras2012.CLI

  • public class CLI
extends Object
    Command-line interface for the app. Processes command-line arguments and decides which application mode should run. This class implements the singleton pattern.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CLI.ApplicationMode
      The modes that the application supports running in.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      String solutionLocation

      • getDatasetLocation

        public String getDatasetLocation()
        Get a location of the data-set.
        Returns:
        Path to a data set file, or null if not provided.

      • getSeed

        public long getSeed()

      • getSolutionLocation

        public String getSolutionLocation()
        Get a location of the solution.
        Returns:

      • printHelp

        public void printHelp()
        Prints a help message, describing the usage of the app from the command-line.

      • process

        public CLI.ApplicationMode process(String[] args)
        Process the command-line argument and make a decision about which application mode should run.
        Parameters:
        args - Command-line arguments.
        Returns:
        The application mode. If it is CLI.ApplicationMode.ERROR, the cause of the problem may be found in errorMessage. In other cases, getDatasetLocation() and getSolutionLocation() may be used to retrieve the important arguments from the command line.
